refnamediv.refpurpose: Set minimum and maximum supported protocol version

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The functions set the minimum and maximum supported portocol versions for the ctx or ssl. This works in combination with the options set via SSL_CTX_set_options 3 that also make it possible to disable specific protocol versions. Use these functions instead of disabling specific protocol versions.
Setting the minimum or maximum version to 0, will enable protocol versions down to the lowest version, or up to the highest version supported by the library, respectively.
Currently supported versions are SSL3_VERSION, TLS1_VERSION, TLS1_1_VERSION, TLS1_2_VERSION for TLS and DTLS1_VERSION, DTLS1_2_VERSION for DTLS.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: Both functions return 1 on success and 0 on failure.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: All these functions are implemented using macros.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: The functions were added in OpenSSL 1.1.0
